column14:
Transactional email is available as an add-on only. You must already have a marketing email subscription at Standard level or above. 

Emails are sold in blocks of 25k emails. The price per block changes depending on total email volume.

column2: What does it cost to send 10,000 emails?*
column14: $20/mo (+the price of your Mailchimp marketing subscription)

column2: What does it cost to send 300,000 emails?*
column14: $240/mo (+the price of your Mailchimp marketing subscription)

column2: What does it cost to send 1M emails*?
column14: $720/mo (+the price of your Mailchimp marketing subscription)

column2: * If the service offers mutiple plan types for this email volume, we're listing the price for the cheapest plan.

Standard data retention
For how long can you access your email insights?
column4:
45 days by default 
Postmark stores email content, events (e.g. delivery, click, open), and metadata for all messages for 45 days on all plan types. Retention can be customized from 7 to 365 days if needed.
column6:
3 days 
(on the Essentials plan. Pro and Premier plans come with 7 days of email history. Extensions are available at an extra charge)
column8:
5 days
Log retention and 1 day of message retention on the lowest plan (Foundation). 30 days of log retention on Scale and 7 days of message retention.
column10:
10 days
Event data is retained for 10 days, while aggregated metrics are available for up to 6 months)
column14:
Stats on total deliveries, bounces and rejections, unique opens and clicks, and total opens and clicksâ€”are stored indefinitely. 

A copy of the HTML and text parts of emails sent are stored for 30 days.

column4:
No. 
Postmark's top-notch customer support via email, chat, or phone is available on all plans (and there's no extra charge for premium support.)
column6:
Yes.
Available support channels and response times vary greatly between plans. 
Sendgrid's Personalized Support gives you access to a dedicated Technical Account manager and starts at $5,000/month.
column8:
Yes.
Chat is only available to customers on Scale plans (and above), phone support is limited to Enterprise customers. Lower plans come with email/ticket support only.
column10:
Yes.
Premier and Enterprise plans come with prioritized support.
